definition: hematoma (internal blood clot)/extravasated blood (spilt into surrounding tissue)/contusion

sentences.english: These patients in two groups were used glucocorticoids adequately in the meantime during petechiae appeared on patients' eyelids.
sentences.chinese: 在出現瘀斑後，兩組均添加大劑量糖皮質激素。

sentences.english: The clinical sign of delay healing shown blister or ecchymosis on distal part of skin flap.
sentences.chinese: 延尺癒合的皮瓣遠端有水泡或瘀斑。

sentences.english: The main accompanying tongue changes were dark purple color and petechia or bruise.
sentences.chinese: 舌質變化主要表現爲舌質紫暗，有瘀點或瘀斑。

sentences.english: Demonstrate knowledge of the differential diagnosis and evaluation of children with petechiae .
sentences.chinese: 展現對於鑑別診斷及評估兒童瘀斑的知。

sentences.english: The extensive white matter petechial hemorrhages seen here are typical for fat embolism syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 廣泛的白質瘀點瘀斑是脂肪栓塞的典型表現。

definition: clotted blood/extravasated blood (leaking into surrounding tissue)/thrombosis

cyanosis (blue skin due to lack of oxygen in blood)
